title: leave buster RITO
body:
hello my dudes i seem to have a problem
so unfortunately i have also received a 20 minute leave buster as clearly shown lagging right out because my internet is trash, i can accept that leaver buster as it is my fault.but i am also wondering why i cant make it through the 20 minutes before it randomly cancels forcing me to reset the timer and i cannot do anything about it

replies.body:
If your internet is still a little unstable or having a hard time keeping its connection to our servers, it might be having a hiccup which makes the matchmaking queue think you stopped searching....which unfortunately makes it reset =(....

I want to try a couple things really quickly and test these in a custom/practice game to make sure you're good to go before trying normal queues again. Update your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 really quickly to see if we can get your network to take a much shorter or smoother path to our servers, but I'd also be sure to try using ethernet if at all possible. 

Let me know if this seems to be helping at all, if not we can dig a little further and get this straightened out if you stick with us ^_^!

thanks for the response! but it still seems to have the same issue. i am also connected to Ethernet!
Sad times!
Were you able to try the DNS steps as well and test those in practice/customs?
i was yes but my ping is perfectly fine during games so i'm unsure on why it is having a problem waiting the 20 mins

Little known fact, the matchmaking queues and in-game servers are completely different connections. On top of that, the matchmaking queue connection can be VERY picky about small interruptions, which packet loss will cause issues with that almost every time in my experience. 

I'd like to try one more thing really quickly to test for packet loss. Grab [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a trace to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1. Post the results here and we can see just what's happening.

Y'know that traceroute looks rather perfect honestly, wasn't expecting that! This could mean it was a coincidence or fluke of some kind where you had packet loss while trying to queue but now it's okay, but it's hard to say for sure. 

I want to make sure we tackle this appropriately if it's still happening, so if it is please be sure to reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with that traceroute.

well it is definitely still happening but i appreciate your help through all this so i have sent in a ticket to the techs with the trace route 
Again thanks for your help!
